com.webreach.mirth.model.Channel.name: censo-silicon-hl7-file

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: xmlMsg

com.webreach.mirth.model.Rule.name: channelStatus

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: _msg_type
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['MSH']['MSH.9']['MSG.1'].toString() + "^" + msg['MSH']['MSH.9']['MSG.2'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('_msg_type', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: HL72Silicon
